data.title: Viva China Expands Stake in Li Ning with Strategic Share Acquisition
data.description:
Viva China Holdings Limited ( (HK:0933) ) has shared an announcement.

Viva China Holdings Limited announced the acquisition of an additional 30,646,500 shares of Li Ning Company Limited, amounting to approximately HK$508,919,000. This acquisition represents about 1.19% of the total issued shares of Li Ning Co and is classified as a discloseable transaction under the Listing Rules. The acquisition was financed through external sources and settled in cash, reflecting the prevailing market prices. This move strengthens Viva China’s investment portfolio and its association with Li Ning, a leading sports brand in the PRC.

More about Viva China Holdings Limited

Viva China Holdings Limited is a multi-brand operator primarily engaged in the design, development, branding, and sales of sports and lifestyle apparel and footwear. The company operates mainly in the United States, the United Kingdom, Europe, the PRC, Hong Kong, Japan, and the Republic of Korea. It is incorporated in the Cayman Islands and listed on the Main Board of the Stock Exchange.

Average Trading Volume: 5,036,916

Technical Sentiment Signal: Buy

Current Market Cap: HK$5.78B

data.description:

This acquisition aligns with the company’s strategy to preserve capital and invest in premium operational assets, benefiting from high demand due to its prime location. data.title: Shanghai Fudan-Zhangjiang Bio-Pharmaceutical Redirects IPO Funds to New Photodynamic Drug Project
data.description:
An announcement from Shanghai Fudan Zhangjiang Bio Pharmaceutical Co ( (HK:1349) ) is now available.

Shanghai Fudan-Zhangjiang Bio-Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. announced a strategic reallocation of funds from its A Share initial public offering. Due to delays in the clinical research progress of its Hemoporfin registration project in the United States, the company will redirect the remaining proceeds to a new innovative research and sustainable development project in photodynamic drugs. This decision aims to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of resource utilization, while continuing the original project’s Phase II clinical research as a sub-project under the new initiative.

More about Shanghai Fudan Zhangjiang Bio Pharmaceutical Co

Shanghai Fudan-Zhangjiang Bio-Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. operates in the biopharmaceutical industry, focusing on the development and commercialization of innovative drugs. The company is particularly known for its work in photodynamic technology and biological medicine, with a market focus on both domestic and international pharmaceutical sectors.

data.title: Luzhou Xinglu Water Proposes Governance Overhaul
data.description:
Luzhou Xinglu Water (Group) Co., Ltd. Class H ( (HK:2281) ) has provided an announcement.

Luzhou Xinglu Water (Group) Co., Ltd. has announced several proposed changes to its corporate governance structure, including amendments to its Articles of Association, the abolition of its Supervisory Committee, and the adoption of new rules for its General Meeting and Board of Directors. These changes aim to align with national laws and regulatory requirements, enhancing the company’s operational and procedural systems. The proposed changes will be subject to approval by the company’s shareholders at a general meeting, signifying a strategic shift in the company’s governance model to potentially streamline operations and improve oversight.

data.title: Shin Hwa World Limited’s Rights Issue Oversubscribed
data.description:
The latest update is out from Shin Hwa World Limited ( (HK:0582) ).

Shin Hwa World Limited announced the results of its Rights Issue, which offered one Rights Share for every existing share held. The Rights Issue was oversubscribed, with valid applications exceeding the total number of Rights Shares offered by approximately 3.69%. The allocation of excess Rights Shares was conducted on a pro-rata basis, fulfilling all conditions set out in the prospectus and rendering the Rights Issue unconditional. The over-subscription resulted in the full discharge of the Underwriter’s obligations under the Underwriting Agreement.

data.title: Huscoke Holdings Reports Improved Comprehensive Income Despite Revenue Decline
data.description:
Huscoke Holdings Limited ( (HK:0704) ) just unveiled an update.

Huscoke Holdings Limited reported its interim results for the six months ending 30 September 2025, showing a decrease in revenue from HK$34,436,000 in 2024 to HK$29,241,000 in 2025. Despite the revenue drop, the company managed to achieve a total comprehensive income of HK$12,447,000, up from HK$10,971,000 in the previous year, due to favorable exchange differences on foreign operations. The company continues to face challenges with a reported loss before tax of HK$12,825,000, although this is an improvement from the previous year’s loss of HK$15,974,000.

More about Huscoke Holdings Limited

Huscoke Holdings Limited is a company incorporated in Bermuda, primarily involved in the production and trading of coke, a derivative of coal used in steel manufacturing and other industrial processes.

data.title: CIRC Achieves Breakthrough in Stable Isotope Technology, Enhancing China’s Medical Capabilities
data.description:
China Isotope & Radiation Corp. ( (HK:1763) ) has issued an announcement.

CIRC has announced a significant technological breakthrough in the production of carbon isotope products, specifically high-abundance 13CO gas, which is crucial for urea breath tests detecting Helicobacter pylori infections. This advancement positions China among the few countries capable of producing these materials, reducing reliance on imports and enhancing the nation’s research and production capabilities in stable isotope technology. Additionally, CIRC has started phase II construction of its stable isotope base project, which will ensure a stable supply of these materials, contributing to public health improvements and supporting the Healthy China Initiative.

data.title: Smart Globe Holdings Expands Operations with New Lease Agreement
data.description:
Smart Globe Holdings Ltd. ( (HK:1481) ) has shared an announcement.

data.title: Innovax Holdings Announces Delay in Document Dispatch for Cash Offer
data.description:
The latest update is out from Innovax Holdings Limited ( (HK:2680) ).

Innovax Holdings Limited has announced a delay in the dispatch of both a circular and a composite document related to a possible unconditional mandatory cash offer by AFG Securities Limited on behalf of Mr. Wang Tingfa. The delay is due to the need for additional time to finalize information and obtain necessary approvals from the SFC for the Offeror to become a substantial shareholder. The company has applied for an extension to meet regulatory requirements, with the Executive indicating a willingness to grant consent for this extension. Stakeholders are advised to await further announcements for updates on the offer’s progress.
